member.name: T:Nomad.Net.SizeReport.Program
member.summary: Entry point for the NOMAD size reporting tool.

member.name: M:Nomad.Net.SizeReport.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Generates size comparison tables for each example set.
member.param: The first argument is the root directory containing example sets. The second argument is an optional output file.

member.summary: Provides helper methods to generate size comparison results.

member.summary: Gets the size comparison results for the specified directory.
member.param: The directory containing paired JSON and NOMAD files.

member.summary: Represents size information for a single scenario.

The size of the NOMAD representation in bytes.

The size of the NOMAD representation in bytes.
